email.title: Feedback survey – DoC Personal Tutor Meetings
email.text:
The Department of Computing is collecting feedback on how personal tutor meetings for computing undergraduate years 1–4 can be improved. Your responses will be used to enhance the personal tutoring experience of DoC students.
After completing the survey you may sign up for a 50£ Amazon voucher raffle.
### [Go to the survey](https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=B3WJK4zudUWDC0-CZ8PTB6fR4jt5i8ZLjrRoms-hBT5UMVRBQkM3UFdSMVFFUUZYVzgxTDVZMlhJSC4u)
